original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Renegade Rampage
overview: Mayhem ensues as the Turtles face new dangerous mutants in a special double episode. The turtles try LARPing, Karai finally realises the truth, mutant villains steal retro-mutagen, and the city is invaded by a new mutant using living pizzas to attack!
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Renegade Rampage
